headline: Real-time Data Collection & Insight
description: An interactive web app that lets users enter data anywhere, anytime. Every submission is stored in an **online PostgreSQL database** and reflected instantly on maps and dashboards – perfect for surveys, incident reporting, or live field research.
highlights: 🔗 **Cloud database** keeps everything in one secure place

headline: Online Inventory & Shop Management
description: A fully integrated online platform for managing inventory, online sales, and customer transactions securely in real-time. Features streamlined checkout, secure user authentication, and instant payment processing.
highlights: 🔐 **Secure Authentication** for users via Google OAuth
📊 Integrated **Analytics Dashboard** for inventory and sales
